test_code_analysis: The tests verify the login functionality of the auth_controller, covering scenarios of successful login, invalid credentials, missing username/password, empty and non-JSON request body, and exception handling.

The tests verify the behavior of the account lock controller's login endpoint, covering scenarios of successful login, invalid credentials, missing user_id or password, empty request body, and invalid JSON.
The tests verify the behavior of the account lockout mechanism during login attempts, including successful login, missing credentials, and account lockout after multiple failed attempts.
